input_str: Time and injuries had already robbed the Pirates of one center-field superstar, reducing Andrew McCutchen to the role of a corner outfielder who’s been a roughly league-average hitter over the past season-plus. Now a positive steroid test will also deprive the Pirates of the superstar who succeeded McCutchen in center, as news broke Tuesday that Starling Marte had tested positive for the anabolic steroid nandrolone and, as a first-time abuser, would be suspended for 80 games under the terms of
